content: the peek a boo bunny basket is a free crochet pattern on my blog this charming crochet pattern is perfect for creating a delightful basket that s as functional as it is cute featuring a sweet bunny face peeking out with a playful expression this basket is ideal for easter egg hunts gifting or adding a touch of whimsy to your spring decor pattern features construction the basket is worked from the bottom up in the round ensuring a seamless and sturdy design that s perfect for holding easter treats or small treasures front post double_crochet fpdc color work the bunny design comes to life with front post double_crochet stitches creating a textured and eye-catching pattern fpdc tutorial link included new to front post double_crochet color work no worries the pattern includes a link to a detailed fpdc tutorial guiding you step-by-step on how to master this technique including graph-reading guidance as well as color-changing and carrying tips the peek-a-boo bunny easter basket is a fun and engaging project for crocheters of all skill levels whether you re making it for your little ones or as a thoughtful handmade gift this basket will bring smiles and springtime cheer to everyone who sees it download the ad-free pdf now and start crocheting your own bunny basket today approximate finished size 6 wide x 3 1/2 tall excluding handle
